page.title: 06YOUTH CLUB
page.content: There is an excellent{Youth Club}run by two local men. It meets every Wednesday at the{Recreation Centre } from 7p.m. until 8.30p.m. There is a charge of 25p per person. It is for{girls}and{boys}aged between{9 and 14 years.}If the weather is fine they meet out of doors. They have a record player, snooker table, table tennis equipment, badminton, indoor bowls and a wide selection of smaller indoor games. They can buy soft drinks, crisps and sweets from the club shop. Activities include sponsored events to raise money for charity, ten_pin bowling, swimming etc. A member said{"I know a lot of {people are glad that there is a youth {club in the village. It is very {popular and has excellent facilities."
